H0.text: Color is the property of sugar that remains after sugar is dissolved in water.

H1.text: Taste is the property of sugar that remains after it is dissolved in water.

H2.text: Shape is the property of sugar that remains after sugar is dissolved in water.

H3.text: Texture is the property of sugar that remains after sugar is dissolved in water.

A4.text: Sweetness is a basic taste most commonly perceived when eating foods rich in sugars.
